idea:
NymbleUp is a cloud based productivity tool that uses sophisticated machine learning to accurately forecast sales and view all the key metrics through a single dashboard. Our solution uses historical sales data, seasonality, growth trends along with external factors such as weather and events to predict sales.

Retailers can use our platform to optimise inventory, reduce stock outs and minimise wastage.

Salient features of our platform is as follows:

1) Item/Location level forecast with more than 90% accuracy at consolidated level
2) New product launch - forecast
3) Sales Analytics

We are in the process of creating a replenishment, inventory and expiry management feature.
name: NYMBLEUP SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are a real time auction based marketplace where micro-publishers from any social media platform can bid on the content they would like to promote and get paid instantly. This is facilitated by a proprietary Reko Points, which we compute using machine learning on multiple engagement metrics. Higher the attention score, higher the payout on sponsored content. 

Since SAS is not dependent on subscriber count alone, we enable the micro-publisher to start earning, even with a handful of subscribers by rewarding quality engagement generated.

Brands and advertisers benefit from the potential of a verified network of publishers with clear engagement tracking on sponsored content, without end user tracking or privacy violations.
